The men's football seconds came back from 2-1 down to convincingly beat Teeside 5-2 on a chilly 3G pitch to finish the term on a high with a sixth straight win

The men's rugby firsts today completed their BUCS season in style, defeating Sheffield 36-14 to cap a year that has seen them win promotion to the Premier League

An impressive performance in the Octopush British Student Nationals saw York's A team claim ninth place whilst the B team claimed 15th, a marked improvement on last year
